name: FindTheBiggest
description: FindTheBiggest, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl, interface: FindTheBiggest).

inputs.name: Args
inputs.description: A unicode string. Additional parameters to the command.

inputs.name: Environ
inputs.description: A dictionary with keys which are a bytes or none or a value of class 'str' and with values which are a bytes or none or a value of class 'str'. Environment variables.

inputs.name: In files
inputs.description: A list of items which are an existing file name. A list of input volumes or a singlematrixfile.

inputs.name: Out file
inputs.description: A file name. File with the resulting segmentation.

inputs.name: Output type
inputs.description: 'nifti' or 'nifti_pair' or 'nifti_gz' or 'nifti_pair_gz'. Fsl output type.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: An existing file name. Output file indexed in order of input files.
